INSERT INTO send_m ( send_m_id, send_code, send_user, send_user_code, box_code, turnoverBox_Code, create_site_code, receive_site_code, car_code, send_type, create_user, create_user_code, create_time, operate_time, update_user_code, updater_user, sendm_status, update_time, yn, shields_car_id, excute_count, excute_time, transport_type, board_code, biz_source ) VALUES
( #{sendM.sendMId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendM.sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendM.sendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendM.sendUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendM.boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendM.turnoverBoxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendM.createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendM.receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendM.carCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendM.sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendM.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendM.createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW(), #{sendM.operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendM.updateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendM.updaterUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{sendM.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendM.yn,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sendM.shieldsCarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0, NOW(), #{sendM.transporttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendM.boardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendM.bizSource,jdbcType=TINYINT})

update send_m
send_code = #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
box_code = #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_user = #{sendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_user_code = #{sendUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_code = #{carCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_type = #{sendType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_code = #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_code = #{updateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updater_user = #{updaterUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = NOW(),
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
shields_car_id = #{shieldsCarId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where send_code = #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and create_site_code = #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM send_m WHERE sendm_status = 0 AND send_type = 20 AND yn = 1 AND (excute_count < 4 OR excute_count IS NULL) AND (excute_time < NOW() OR excute_time IS NULL) AND operate_time <= timestampadd(minute,-5,NOW()) LIMIT 100
select box_code from send_m where send_code = #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1 AND create_site_code = #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
